timeServer.title: Time Server
timeServer.description: The ntp server to connect to. Availability: macOS 10.12.4 and later.

timeZone.title: Time Zone
timeZone.description: Time zone path location string in /usr/share/zoneinfo/. For example, 'America/Denver' or 'Zulu'. For a list of available time zones, run 'sudo systemsetup -listtimezones' in Terminal. Availability: macOS 10.12.4 and later.
